title: Risu Server
author: KalyaSante <contact@kalyasante.com>
description: A self-hosted server and service management panel
tagline: Manage your servers and services with ease
postInstallMessage:
Welcome to Risu Server! Your server management panel is ready to use.

**Getting Started:**
1. The application uses Cloudron authentication - no additional setup required
2. Start adding your servers and services through the dashboard
3. Configure your service monitoring and deployment settings

**Important:** All data is stored locally and will persist across updates.
